column1: in memory of selma lane -- tillman funeral home & crematory| selma lane. april 11
column6: a longtime resident of west palm beach
column8: 2015 at the age of 92. she is survived by her daughters
column11: and alene lane. she was the beloved grandmother of stephen schiff
column13: and matthew (amanda) foster. selma was a selfless person who loved her family and friends and left a lasting impression on everyone she met. graveside services tuesday june 16th
column17: contributions may be made to hospice of palm beach county (trust. bridge)
column20: florida 33407 or peggy adams rescue league
